attributes.action: Change the system of school education
attributes.additional_details: I want them to change it because what we learn is school does help but when they step into the big wide world they dont know how taxes work they dont know how bills work we need to educate them
attributes.background: The system of school education dosent teach how to actually survive in the real world and i want to change that so every child or teenager leaves school with a knowing of how the world really spins

rejection.details:
We understand you would like to see changes to the education system, however we're not sure what exact changes you would like to see.

You could start a new petition asking the Government to make changes to the curriculum if this is something you would like to see happen.
